name: World Soccer Agent
description:
Play this mobile football manager tycoon game and get billionaire, recruit players and hire them to make money from football world, the stadium vibrates with your top football transfers.

You have to spy teams and recruit uefa scouts to your team to be a legend of money making and earn prestige to your staff, win negotiations, hire soccer stars, get millions of money from sport to upgrade your office, recruit the best staff and become a top legendary sport management star.

Win fame to your top soccer scouts club, be a rich manager and win score hiring the best fifa soccer stars negotiating with the top sport clubs in the world. Make money from your transfers, be a top manager and recruit players from France, Spain, Great Britain, Germany, Italy, Switzerland...
